thread.title: Sporting Goods Ecommerce Business

title: Sporting Goods Ecommerce Business
text: Questions Business Summary Four Year old business that offers sporting goods and accessories with a focus on team sports such as baseball, softball, basketball and football. April YTD sales of over $1,000,000. 95% of all orders drop shipped. Average order size is $150 on the website. 90% orders are placed online and 10% via phone. Good standing relationship with over 50 suppliers. The company has a special division that focuses on team sales to various academies, schools, colleges, universities and recreational programs on a nationwide level. This is a distressed business needing a new tactical marketing plan and an owner who has business experience. Many potential growth opportunities including: Expansion to additional CPA shopping engines, addition of PPC marketing campaign, social marketing expansion and viral or email marketing campaign targeting user demographic. Owner will provide strong transitional support based on the specific needs of the buyer. Financials
